text: وَلَوْ جَآءَتْهُمْ كُلُّ ءَايَةٍ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ

translation.en.sahih: Even if every sign should come to them, until they see the painful punishment.
translation.id.indonesian: meskipun datang kepada mereka segala macam keterangan, hingga mereka menyaksikan azab yang pedih.
